description: Conversation where a tenant asks about the upcoming annual HVAC service, and the assistant retrieves the maintenance schedule and informs the tenant of the date.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent that can fetch lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond helpfully and use the provided tools when needed.
Hi, could you tell me when the annual HVAC service is scheduled for my unit? My property ID is P-1001.
Sure, let me pull the maintenance schedule for property **P-1001**.
Your annual HVAC service is scheduled for **February 15, 2025**. If you need to reschedule or have any other questions, just let me know!
